mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(e.examId) FROM exam e,exampaper p

SELECT e.examId, e.examName, (SELECT COUNT(gradeId) FROM employeeexam WHERE employeeexam.examId = e.examId) as employeeNum, IFNULL((SELECT haulinfo.bigName FROM haulinfo WHERE bigId = e.bigId),'无') AS bigName, e.examLevel, e.examType, p.paperId, e.answerTime as totalTime, e.traincontent, e.xueshi, e.status, e.startTime, e.endTime FROM exam e, exampaper p
ORDER BY e.createTime DESC
select count(paperId) from exam where paperId=#{value}
SELECT COUNT(examId) FROM exam WHERE paperId=#{value} AND exam.status != '未开始'
SELECT DISTINCT examName,examlevel,traincontent,xueshi FROM exam WHERE examName LIKE '%${value}%' limit 0,5

select exam.examName,exam.examLevel,exam.traincontent,exam.xueshi,exam.startTime,exam.endTime,exampaper.paperScore,employeeexam.grade from exam ,employeeexam,exampaper where employeeexam.examId=exam.examId and exampaper.paperId=exam.paperId and employeeexam.employeeId=#{hiddenidcode} and exam.status="已结束" and employeeexam.employeeType="0" ORDER BY exam.startTime DESC

select count(exam.examName) from exam ,employeeexam,exampaper where employeeexam.examId=exam.examId and exampaper.paperId=exam.paperId and employeeexam.employeeId=#{employeeid} and exam.status="已结束" and employeeexam.employeeType="0";

select exam.examName,exam.examLevel,exam.traincontent,exam.xueshi,exam.startTime,exam.endTime,exampaper.paperScore,employeeexam.grade from exam ,employeeexam,exampaper where employeeexam.examId=exam.examId and exampaper.paperId=exam.paperId and employeeexam.employeeId=#{employeeid} and exam.status="已结束" and employeeexam.employeeType="0" ORDER BY exam.startTime DESC;
